revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-857 |revision=A1 |upc=790069352218 |ean= |asin=B0068ALVAO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/29/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR857MO1 |ic_id=4216A-IR857MO1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP8000AU |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M168P-CG |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe,USB 3.0,SD Card |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=D-Link DIR-857MO1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9380 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=D-Link DIR-857MO1 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9380 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PCIe Switch (wireless module);Pericom PI7C9X20303SL;Pericom;PI7C9X20303SL;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=dlink,dlink_media |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$,,,^dlink_media$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui=B8:A3:86 |oui_eth=B8:A3:86 }} {{TagLine|HD Media Router 3000}} [http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/connect/routers/dir-857-dualband-hd-media-router Product page (Main)] [http://amplifi.dlink.com/products/DIR-857 Product page ('''Amplifi''')] [http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/5/1491_b.html Product page (RU)]
[http://www.dlink.com/us/en/support/product/dir-857-dualband-hd-media-router Support page] [ftp://ftp.dlink.eu/datasheets/DIR-857.pdf Datasheet (EU)] The FCC ID covers the daughterboard for the unit.
The daughterboard is a Cameo product and it is assumed the main board is also OEM Cameo.
There is a '''Pericom''' packet switch on the wireless module board, same as the [[D-Link DIR-827]]. [http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA12841 Wi-Fi Certified] ===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31788-d-link-dir-857-hd-media-router-3000-reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :This device appears to share the same basic hardware as the [[D-Link DIR-827]]. :'''dlink''' (2.4GHz) and '''dlink_media''' (5GHz) default SSIDs * [http://www.redeszone.net/d-link/dir-857-n900/ Review on '''redes-zone'''] (w/ high-res photos) :B8:A3:86 OUI :12V, 2A power * [http://us.hardware.info/reviews/2892/3/d-link-dir-857-router-review-including-usb-30-and-sd-pci-e Review on '''uk.hardware.info'''] (w/ fairly high-res board shots) :B8:A3:86 OUI * [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/124-d-link-dir-857.html Review on '''FoxNetWork'''] : The main elements of the other board are placed on one side. A [[Ubicom]] IP8000AU chip is used as a SoC processor. : RAM is represented by two 256 Mbytes [http://www.nanya.com/PageEdition3.aspx?Menu_ID=109&def=210&lan=en-us NANYA NT5CB128M16BP] modules meaning that the overall RAM available to the device is 512 Mbytes. : One of them performs the sole function of a wireless module and uses a PCI-E [http://www.pericom.com/assets/Databriefs/PI7C9X20303SL_db.pdf Pericom PI7C9X20303SL] switch. __NOTOC__
